ModMetaData.name: Lockable Doors
ModMetaData.author: Khell
ModMetaData.description: Requires HugsLib. Adds lockable doors and autodoors to the game after appropriate research projects Door Locks for normal doors and Locking Autodoors for autodoors have been completed. Finally, your colonists can have a night of undisturbed sleep without needing to build a hallway if you don't want to!
